name: Call Me Young Kaleido
description:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Theihe803

Discord: https://discord.gg/8s4thNx

Originally published on: 2017/01/31 CMYK is a game avaliable in 18 languages where you play as Kaleido through a series of tricky puzzle platforming rooms spanning over 60 maps in which you change the background colour in order to see things that might otherwise be hidden away...
